name: Rewind It!
description:
The goal of the game is to move the green square to the light gray one, simple right? The game has a unique rewind mechanic, you can rewind everything as it was at the start of the level, except one square, making the simple game much more interesting.

How to play

  • To move a square simply click on it, swipe to the direction you want to move it and release to button.
  • To rewind just click and hold on a square. Doing this will rewind every square to its starting position, except the on you selected.
  • The number on the squares show how many times can that square move.
  • An arrow on a square shows where you can move that square.
  • Blue squares cannot be rewinded.
  • Black squares are not movable.

Level editor

The game has a level editor, so you can make your own levels if mine aren't as good :D

Level editor controls

  • Left click to place the selected items.
  • Right click to remove the selected items.
  • Pencil tool: edit the amount of moves, left click to add, right click to subtract
  • Set where the squares can move with the four way arrow tool (didn't give the tool a name)

Extra levels to play

Here are some extra levels which will be added once the jam is over (Make sure to only copy the code)

-2:1;-2:2;-2:3;-2:4;-2:5;-3:4;-4:4;-5:4;-6:4;-7:4;-8:4;-3:2;-4:2;-5:2;-6:2;-7:2;-8:2;-1:4;0:4;1:4;2:4;3:4;4:4;-1:2;0:2;1:2;2:2;3:2N4:2N-8:2N0:4:1:All;1:4:1:All;2:4:1:All;3:4:1:All;4:4:1:All;-1:2:2:All;0:2:2:All;1:2:2:All;2:2:2:All;3:2:2:All;4:2:2:AllN-8:4:2147483647:AllNN -5:-1;-5:-2;-6:-1;-7:-1;-8:-1;-9:-2;-8:-2;-7:-2;-6:-2;-7:0;-8:0;-9:0;-10:-1;-10:-2;-10:0;-11:-3;-11:-1;-10:-3;-9:-3;-11:-2;-11:0;-8:-3;-7:-3;-11:1;-10:1;-9:1;-8:1;-7:1;-7:2;-11:2;-10:2;-9:2;-8:2;-6:1;-6:0;-5:1;-5:0;-4:2;-4:1;-4:0;-4:-1;-4:-2;-4:-3N-9:-1NN-11:1:2:AllN-4:-3:2147483647:AllNN-2:3;-1:3;0:3;1:3;2:3;3:3;4:3;5:3;6:3;4:2;8:3N7:3NN0:3:2147483647:Right;2:3:2147483647:Right;7:3:2147483647:Right;3:3:2147483647:Right;5:3:2147483647:RightN-2:3:2147483647:AllN4:3:2147483647:VerticalN

If you want to create your own levels make sure you're using the desktop version, browsers doesn't support copy to clipboard. Feel free to share level codes in the comments.
